title: #115: The New LBRY of Alexandria | Jeremy Kauffman
description:
If there is one thing that we can always count on it’s that the American government will overreach and try to destroy anyone that challenges their perceived authority.

Jeremy Kauffman, the founder, and CEO of LBRY explains why the Securities and Exchange Commission has set their sights on his company in an attempt to destroy the decentralized video platform and cryptocurrency company. The fight has just begun, and Jeremy explains why this is important, not just for his company, but for the cryptocurrency industry in general.

As YouTube alienates millions of their users each month with ridiculous and constantly changing “terms of service”, LBRY has stepped up to fill the void to the tune of over 20 million users in just a few years. The LBRY is open, but will it remain that way?
